definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be opportune, meet, encounter opportunely (Ar. 0’anay the right time is come, or it is come to the right time, or to maturity, or is opportune).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[אִנׇּה ]] Ex 21:13 cause (or allow) to meet in [[בְיׇדוֹ]] ´[[הָאֱלֽהִים א]] (obj. om.), i.e. without any purpose of the man to whom sf. Ref.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: be allowed to meet, be sent, Impf. [[יְאֻנֶּה]] Pr 12:21 (c. [[ל]]); 3 fs. [[תְּאֻנֶּה]] Ps 91:10 (c. [[אָל]]), subj. evil.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: cause oneself to meet, seek occasion (= seek a quarrel with) sq. [[ל]] 2Ki 5:7.
